outline:
1. to be of use or service or profit or benefit
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be of use or service
      2. servitor, steward (participle)
      3. to benefit, profit
    2. (Hiphil) to be used, be wont, exhibit use or habit, show harmony with, be familiar with, know intimately
kjv_def: acquaint (self), be advantage, [idiom] ever, (be, (un-)) profit(-able), treasurer, be wont.
strongs_def: to be familiar with; by implication, to minister to, be serviceable to, be customary
